languages.text: {n}Подобно глади бездонного омута поверхность плиты покрывается рябью, смывая предыдущие символы и выводя новые, горящие мертвенно-зеленым светом.{/n} "Владыка, зрю истину о Них, жадной жатвой испивавших светила, слепотой на нас зрящих, покуда их чрево знало тщетную сытость".

traits.locale_text: {n}Подобно глади бездонного омута, поверхность плиты покрывается рябью от вашего прикосновения, смывая предыдущие символы и выводя новые, горящие мертвенно-зеленым светом.{/n} "Владыка, узри истину о Звездных Богах, жадной жатвой испивавших светила, слепотой на нас зрящих, покуда их чрево знало тщетную сытость".

languages.text: {n}The slab's surface wavers and ripples like a bottomless lake. The symbols are washed away and replaced with new ones, their green glow as bright as it is lifeless.{/n} "My Lord, I behold the truth of Them, the rapacious reapers who drank stars dark. Blind was Their eyes' gaze set upon us; futile was Their engorgement, for They would never be sated."
languages.original_text: {n}Подобно глади бездонного омута поверхность плиты покрывается рябью, смывая предыдущие символы и выводя новые, горящие мертвенно-зеленым светом.{/n} "Владыка, зрю истину о Них, жадной жатвой испивавших светила, слепотой на нас зрящих, покуда их чрево знало тщетную сытость".

traits.locale_text: {n}The slab's surface waves and ripples, like that of a still but bottomless lake. The symbols are washed away and a new set appears. Their green glow is as bright as it's lifeless.{/n} "My Lord, I behold the truth of Them, the rapacious reapers who drank stars dark. Blind was Their eyes' gaze that was set upon us; futile was Their maws' engorgement, for They were never sated."

Their green glow is as bright as it's lifeless.{/n} "My Lord, I behold the truth of Them, the rapacious reapers who drank stars dark. Blind was Their eyes' gaze that was set upon us; futile was Their maws' engorgement, for They were never sated."

Blind was Their eyes' gaze set upon us; futile was Their engorgement, for They would never be sated."

Blind was Their eyes' gaze set upon us; futile was Their engorgement, for They would never be sated."

languages.text: {n}La superficie de la losa ondea como si se tratara de un lago sin fondo. Los símbolos se borran y los sustituyen otros. Su luz verde es tan brillante como inerte.{/n} «Mi Señor, he contemplado su verdad, la de los segadores rapaces que beben estrellas hasta extinguirlas. La mirada que nos dirigen es ciega y su voracidad es fútil, pues son insaciables».
languages.original_text: {n}The slab's surface wavers and ripples like a bottomless lake. The symbols are washed away and replaced with new ones, their green glow as bright as it is lifeless.{/n} "My Lord, I behold the truth of Them, the rapacious reapers who drank stars dark. Blind was Their eyes' gaze set upon us; futile was Their engorgement, for They would never be sated."

traits.locale_text: {n}La superficie de la losa ondea como si se tratara de un lago sin fondo. Los símbolos se borran y los sustituyen otros. Su luz verde es tan brillante como inerte.{/n} «Mi Señor, he contemplado su verdad, la de los segadores rapaces que beben estrellas hasta extinguirlas. La mirada que nos dirigen es ciega y su voracidad es fútil, pues son insaciables».

languages.text: {n}La surface de la dalle ondule, comme un lac sans fond. Les vagues emportent les symboles et les remplacent par d'autres qui émettent eux aussi une lueur vive, mais dénuée de vie.{/n} « Mon seigneur, je vois la vérité de ces faucheurs avides qui dévoraient les étoiles. Leur regard, lorsqu'il s'est posé sur nous, était vide. Leur voracité était futile, car jamais Ils ne seraient rassasiés. »
languages.original_text: {n}The slab's surface wavers and ripples like a bottomless lake. The symbols are washed away and replaced with new ones, their green glow as bright as it is lifeless.{/n} "My Lord, I behold the truth of Them, the rapacious reapers who drank stars dark. Blind was Their eyes' gaze set upon us; futile was Their engorgement, for They would never be sated."

traits.locale_text: {n}La surface de la dalle ondule, comme un lac sans fond. Les vagues emportent les symboles et les remplacent par d'autres qui émettent eux aussi une lueur vive, mais dénuée de vie.{/n} « Mon seigneur, je vois la vérité de ces faucheurs avides qui dévoraient les étoiles. Leur regard, lorsqu'il s'est posé sur nous, était vide. Leur voracité était futile, car jamais Ils ne seraient rassasiés. »

languages.text: {n}平板の表面は底なしの湖のように波打ち、さざ波立つ。シンボルは洗い流され、新しいものにとって代わられる。その緑の輝きは、生気が感じられないほどに明るい。{/n}「主よ、私は彼ら、星々を飲み込んだ貪欲な死神たちの真実を目撃しました。彼らは盲目で、食事は無為である。なぜなら彼らは決して食べ足りることなどないのですから」
languages.original_text: {n}The slab's surface wavers and ripples like a bottomless lake. The symbols are washed away and replaced with new ones, their green glow as bright as it is lifeless.{/n} "My Lord, I behold the truth of Them, the rapacious reapers who drank stars dark. Blind was Their eyes' gaze set upon us; futile was Their engorgement, for They would never be sated."

traits.locale_text: {n}平板の表面は底なしの湖のように波打ち、さざ波立つ。シンボルは洗い流され、新しいものにとって代わられる。その緑の輝きは、生気が感じられないほどに明るい。{/n}「主よ、私は彼ら、星々を飲み込んだ貪欲な死神たちの真実を目撃しました。彼らは盲目で、食事は無為である。なぜなら彼らは決して食べ足りることなどないのですから」

languages.text: {n}金属板泛起了涟漪，仿佛无底的湖泊一样。原本的符号褪去，新的符号呈现出来，发出了毫无生机的明亮绿光。{/n}“我的主，我看到了他们的真理。他们是贪婪的收割者。他们吞没了群星，使其陷入黑暗。他们的目光充满了盲目，他们的饱餐徒劳无功，因为他们永远无法得到餍足。”
languages.original_text: {n}The slab's surface wavers and ripples like a bottomless lake. The symbols are washed away and replaced with new ones, their green glow as bright as it is lifeless.{/n} "My Lord, I behold the truth of Them, the rapacious reapers who drank stars dark. Blind was Their eyes' gaze set upon us; futile was Their engorgement, for They would never be sated."

traits.locale_text: {n}金属板泛起了涟漪，仿佛无底的湖泊一样。原本的符号褪去，新的符号呈现出来，发出了毫无生机的明亮绿光。{/n}“我的主，我看到了他们的真理。他们是贪婪的收割者。他们吞没了群星，使其陷入黑暗。他们的目光充满了盲目，他们的饱餐徒劳无功，因为他们永远无法得到餍足。”

languages.text: {n}Die Oberfläche der Tafel kräuselt sich wie ein unendlich tiefer See. Die Symbole werden fortgespült und durch neue ersetzt. Das grüne Schimmern ist ebenso hell wie leblos.{/n} "Herr, ich erkenne ihre Wahrheit, die gierigen Schnitter, die Sterne dunkel getrunken haben. Blind war der Blick ihrer Augen, der auf uns gerichtet war; vergebens war ihr Gelage, denn nichts konnte sie je sättigen."
languages.original_text: {n}The slab's surface wavers and ripples like a bottomless lake. The symbols are washed away and replaced with new ones, their green glow as bright as it is lifeless.{/n} "My Lord, I behold the truth of Them, the rapacious reapers who drank stars dark. Blind was Their eyes' gaze set upon us; futile was Their engorgement, for They would never be sated."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Oberfläche der Tafel kräuselt sich wie ein unendlich tiefer See. Die Symbole werden fortgespült und werden durch neue ersetzt. Ihr grünes Leuchten ist ebenso hell wie leblos.{/n} "Herr, ich erkenne ihre Wahrheit, die gierigen Schnitter, die Sterne dunkel getrunken haben. Blind war der Blick ihrer Augen, der auf uns gerichtet war; vergebens war ihr Gelage, denn nichts konnte sie je sättigen."

languages.text: {n}Tabakanın yüzeyi, dipsiz bir göl gibi kıpırdanıyor ve dalgalanıyor. Semboller siliniyor ve yerlerini yenileri alıyor. Yeşil parıltıları, cansız olduğu kadar ışıltılı çıkıyor.{/n} "Lordum, Onların gerçeğine şahit oldum. Yıldızları içip karanlık getiren haris biçicilerin gerçeğine. Bizim üzerimizdeki gözleri kördü, açlıklarını tatmin etme çabaları beyhudeydi. Çünkü Onlar asla doyamazdı."
languages.original_text: {n}The slab's surface wavers and ripples like a bottomless lake. The symbols are washed away and replaced with new ones, their green glow as bright as it is lifeless.{/n} "My Lord, I behold the truth of Them, the rapacious reapers who drank stars dark. Blind was Their eyes' gaze set upon us; futile was Their engorgement, for They would never be sated."
